name: BoomerSchlang
description:
Throw the BOOMERANG!

[ DOWNLOAD LINK BELOW ]

- CONTROLS -

WASD - Move your character

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Hold to paint targets, release to throw your boomerang

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - CLICK to display your current weapons / items.  HOLD to use items

ENTER - Start game

ESC / P - Pause

- CREDITS -

Follow me on Twitter @NPJarcade

Programming, artwork and graphics by NPJarcade, UK, 2019.

SFX randomly generated using ChipTone - http://sfbgames.com/chiptone

Music created using Beepbox - http://www.beepbox.co
